title: A pulsed spacecharge technique for measuring ionic mobilities in liquid.
abstract: By measuring the spacecharge-limited field emission and field ionization characteristics, ionic mobilities in cryogenic liquids including helium can be easily determined. The technique developed uses a simple diode electrode structure similar to that used previously to study dc characteristics
